# geo_popn_density

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of geo_popn_density is to analyse the population densities for selected
countries - currently only Australia and the United States.

## Installation

Clone from GitHub then install into R.

## Notebooks

See R Notebook exploring data on [rpubs.com](https://rpubs.com/qwertytam/geo_popn_density) or [here on Github](https://github.com/qwertytam/geo.popn.density/blob/master/densities/densities.md)
